content: > use these codes to save when you buy > multiple patterns > - saveon3 to save 10% off 3 patterns > - saveon5 to save 15% off 5 patterns > - saveon8 to save 20% off 8 patterns > > add all patterns to cart for discount > limit one use per purchase **this pattern is also available for free at https //www 1dogwoof com/dapper-cat-crochet-cuddler-free-pattern/** the dapper cat crochet cuddler is made to make anyone smile young or old worked up in a super bulky faux fur yarn and featuring a kawaii inspired face and that perfect little bow this handsome fellow is a hefty hunk of squishable huggable softness this pattern uses basic crochet stitches there is some complexity to sewing on the face ……………………………………………………………………………… the ad-free pdf is beautifully formatted for easy printing and downloading it includes a complete materials list abbreviations and stitch definitions pattern notes written instructions step-by-step picture tutorial ……………………………………………………………………………… pattern uses us crochet terminology and is available only in english ……………………………………………………………………………… making finished items you can sell finished products made from this pattern by giving credit to me as the designer and linking to the original blog post pattern please be respectful and do not sell or distribute this pattern in any way especially as your own instead share the original blog post link ……………………………………………………………………………… return policy there are no returns on digital files please contact me with any further questions ……………………………………………………………………………… thanks for browsing find me at website - www 1dogwoof com instagram - www instagram com/1dogwoof facebook - www facebook com/onedogwoof youtube - www youtube com/1dogwoof pinterest - www pinterest com/1dogwoof twitter - www twitter com/1dogwoof
